# The `ScopeExit.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines the make&#95;scope&#95;exit function, which executes user-defined cleanup logic at scope exit. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file defines the make&#95;scope&#95;exit function, which executes user-defined cleanup logic at scope exit.
